ID to represent auto sleep duration to 4 ms

This Specifies maximum number of enum elements and it is used only for error handling
enum values to represent various Auto-sleep duration applicable only in low power mode

enum values to represent Bandwidth supported by the Gyroscope
sets Powermode to normal
sets Powermode to deep suspend
sets Powermode to suspend
sets Powermode to fast powerup
sets Powermode to advanced powerup
sets Powermode to suspend
sets Powermode to normal

briefdescription.para: Function to DeInitializes the Gyroscope referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
Gyroscope De-initialization success.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of any other error refer Bmg160Utils_uninitialize or Bmi160Utils_uninitialize error codes.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Reads the bandwidth for the Gyroscope referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
bandwidth Collects the last set Bandwidth value from the gyro sensor
Getting Bandwidth success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of getting bandwidth values other than Gyroscope_Bandwidth_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmg160LibErrorMapping or BMI160_libErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Reads the power mode for the Gyroscope by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
powermode Collects the last set power mode value from gyro sensor
Getting power mode success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of getting power mode other than Gyroscope_Powermode_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmg160LibErrorMapping or BMI160_libErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Reads the Range for the Gyroscope referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
range Collects the last set measurement range value from the sensor
Getting range success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of getting range values other than Gyroscope_Range_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmg160LibErrorMapping or BMI160_libErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Function to initialize Gyroscope.This needs to be called before calling any other API.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
Gyroscope initialization success.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of any other error refer Bmg160Utils_initialize or Bmi160Utils_initialize error codes.
This function needs to be called before calling any other Gyroscope API.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Reads an Xyz degree value from the Gyroscope referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
value Collects the XYZ value of gyro sensor in milli Degree
Reading xyzDegree value success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer Bmg160Utils_remapAxis, Bmi160Utils_remapAxis, bma2x2LibErrorMapping or bmi160LibErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Reads an xyz values from the Gyroscope referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
value Collects the XYZ value of gyro sensor in LSB
Reading xyz value success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer Bmg160Utils_remapAxis, Bmi160Utils_remapAxis, bma2x2LibErrorMapping or bmi160LibErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Sets the Auto-SleepDuration for Gyroscope referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
Represents the AutoSleepDuration that needs to be configured for gyro sensor
It needs to be the value read from gyroscopeGetBandwidth(), this is required for proper operation of gyro sensor in advanced power saving mode only
Set auto sleep Duration success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle or setting auto sleep values other than Gyroscope_AutoSleepDuration_E.
In case of Invalid sensor selection.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmg160LibErrorMapping API.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Sets the bandwidth for the Gyroscope referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
Represents the bandwidth that needs to be configured for gyro sensor
Bandwidth setting success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of setting bandwidth values other than Gyroscope_Bandwidth_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmg160LibErrorMapping or BMI160_libErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Sets the powermode for the Gyroscope by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
Represents the power mode that needs to be configured for gyro sensor
Setting power mode success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of setting power mode other than Gyroscope_Powermode_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmg160LibErrorMapping or BMI160_libErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Sets the Range for the Gyroscope by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
Represents the measurement range that needs to be configured for gyro sensor
Setting range success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of setting range values other than Gyroscope_Range_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmg160LibErrorMapping or BMI160_libErrorMapping API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Sets the SleepDuration for Gyroscope referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the Gyroscope object
Represents the Sleep Duration that needs to be configured for gyroscope sensor
Set Sleep Duration success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle or setting sleep duration values other than Gyroscope_SleepDuration_E.
In case of Invalid sensor selection.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer bmg160LibErrorMapping API.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.
